channel.title: Um.. how do i log on my own server?
channel.description:
I couldnt find anything under search, maybe I worded it wrong, but I have gone through all the steps of setting up a server using 2 guides and am ready to look around.
What ip do I use to log onto my own running server?
I am on wireless connection but I dont think it should matter, I still forwarded everthing at my router.
I have tried "localhost" and that doesnt seem to work. I tried the no-ip that I am using to no avail.
Also... does the server folder need to be anywhere in particular? Its on the desktop.
I Compiled and ran it before trying to log in.
I feel like a fool, I can use scar, edit scripts etc.. but am dumbfouded about this, and cant find the info. What am I missing? thanks

item.title: Um.. how do i log on my own server?
item.dc:creator: @runeh4ck runeh4ck
item.description:
@runeh4ck wrote:

r0flma0 127.0.0.1 best server ever try it!

item.title: Um.. how do i log on my own server?
item.dc:creator: @jobu jobu
item.description:
@jobu wrote:

oh ffs, I didnt know I had to keep runserver.bat open while trying to log in. Rofl it was dumb luck I figured it out. Thanks for the quick replies

Read full topic
